listitem.para: handle, the handle of the default axes.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The default axes is a graphic entity which is never drawn. It is used as a reference for the axes properties default values. These default properties values are used to initialize new axes inside figures.
The gda function returns the handle on the default axes. The user can use this handle to set or get the axes properties default values.

para.note: Note that an equivalent default graphic entity exists for figure entities too (see gdf).
